definition: A term used to describe the numerical representation of the current time, typically expressed in hours and minutes. It is commonly utilized when referring to specific times of the day or scheduling appointments.

examples.german: Kannst du mir die Uhrzeit sagen?
examples.english: Can you tell me the time?

examples.german: Die Uhrzeit spielt eine wichtige Rolle in unserem Alltag.
examples.english: Time plays an important role in our daily life.
